column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So I thought to myself I've got plenty of time to check out another Chicago place to eat
column3: saw it was .7 miles away and called the uber. As soon as I arrived at stans
column4: I got a text saying my table was ready and they'll hold it for 5 minutes. CRAP!!! Texted them back and said I was in the bathroom
column5: whoops. Â My table was ready within 15 minutes.
